member.name: M:WolframAlphaNET.Misc.QueryResultHelper.RecalculateResults(WolframAlphaNET.Objects.QueryResult,System.Boolean)
member.summary: In case ScanTimeout was set too low, some scanners might have timedout. This method tries to recalculate the query in such a way that only the timedout scanners return their result. This is especially useful in a multi-threaded environment.
member.param: The new pods that have been calculated.
When true, it will add the new pods to the original QueryResult

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.Objects.Pod.Markup
member.summary: They only appear if the requested result formats include html.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.Objects.Pod.Async
member.summary: Temporary link that have a lifetimes of about a half hour or so.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.Objects.QueryResult.Recalculate
member.summary: A link to calculate the pods that did not make it within the scan timeout.

member.name: M:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the Wolfram Alpha API
member.param: An ID provided by Wolfram Research that identifies the application or organization making the request.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.UseTLS
member.summary: Set to false to use HTTP instead of HTTPS. HTTPS is used by default.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.ApiUrl
member.summary: The URL which the service listens on. IF you don't set the scheme to http:// or https:// it will default to https.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Formats
member.summary: Optional; Determines the formats of the output Defaults to "plaintext,image"

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Assumptions
member.summary: Optional; Specifies an assumption, such as the meaning of a word or the value of a formula variable.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.OutputUnit
member.summary: Optional; Lets you specify the preferred measurement system, either "metric" or "nonmetric" (U.S. customary units). Note: Defaults to making a decision based on the caller's geographic location. If the location is set.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.IncludePodIDs
member.summary: Optional; Specifies a pod ID to include. You can specify more than one of these elements in the query. Only pods with the given IDs will be returned. Default is all pods.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.ExcludePodIDs
member.summary: Optional; Specifies a pod ID to exclude. You can specify more than one of these elements in the query. Pods with the given IDs will be excluded from the result. Default is to exclude no pods.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.PodTitles
member.summary: Optional; Specifies a pod title. You can specify more than one of these elements in the query. Only pods with the given titles will be returned. You can use * as a wildcard to match zero or more characters in pod titles. Default is all pods.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.PodIndex
member.summary: Optional; Specifies the index of the pod(s) to return. This is an alternative to specifying pods by title or ID. You can give a single number or a sequence like "2,3,5". Default is all pods.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Scanners
member.summary: Optional; Specifies that only pods produced by the given scanner should be returned. You can specify more than one of these elements in the query. Default is all pods.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.ParseTimeout
member.summary: Optional; The number of seconds to allow Wolfram|Alpha to spend in the "parsing" stage of processing. Default is 5.0 seconds

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.ScanTimeout
member.summary: Optional; The number of seconds to allow Wolfram|Alpha to compute results in the "scan" stage of processing. Default is 3.0 seconds

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.PodTimeout
member.summary: Optional; The number of seconds to allow Wolfram|Alpha to spend in the "format" stage for any one pod. Default is 4.0 seconds

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.FormatTimeout
member.summary: Optional; The number of seconds to allow Wolfram|Alpha to spend in the "format" stage for the entire collection of pods.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.UseAsync
member.summary: Optional; Wolfram|Alpha can use an asynchronous mode that allows partial results to come back before all the pods are computed. The number of pods that comes in the partial request depends on their size and number. gets set to 0.4 if UseAsync is set to true. Use ReCalculate() as a means of getting more partial results

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.IpAddress
member.summary: Optional; By default, Wolfram|Alpha attempts to determine the caller's location from the caller IP address, but you can override the IP here.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Location
member.summary: Optional; You can specify your physical location here in the form "Los Angeles, CA" or similar.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.GPSLocation
member.summary: Optional; Lets you specify a latitude/longitude pair like "40.42,-3.71". Negative latitude values are South, and negative longitude values are West.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Width
member.summary: The width of the images drawn. When Wolfram|Alpha formats results to the width value, it will attempt to detect if undesirable line breaks were forced to be used, and if so it will automatically re-format to your larger Default is 500 pixels.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.MaxWidth
member.summary: The maximum width of images drawn. Default is 500 pixels.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.PlotWidth
member.summary: The width of ploits that are drawn. Default is 200 pixels.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Magnification
member.summary: The amount of magnification to use in images. Default is 1.0

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Signature
member.summary: Optional; A special signature that can be applied to guard against misuse of your AppID. Talk to Wolfram Alpha on how to get a signature.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.ReInterpret
member.summary: Optional; Whether to allow Wolfram|Alpha to reinterpret queries that would otherwise not be understood. Default is false.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.IgnoreCase
member.summary: Whether to force Wolfram|Alpha to ignore case in queries. Default is false.

member.name: P:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.EnableTranslate
member.summary: Whether to allow Wolfram|Alpha to try to translate simple queries into English. Default is true.

member.name: M:WolframAlphaNET.WolframAlpha.Query(System.String)
member.summary: Query on Wolfram Alpha using the specified
member.param: The query you would like to search for on Wolfram Alpha
